name: Lawnmower game: Mortal Race
description:
Game story:


Lawnmower game series continues. Newest part your mission is to complete different tracks under limited time which is 60 seconds. End of track there is finish flag and then level is finished when player hits it. Player can use turbo boost items to increase speed. Game also contains health system and there are different enemies and traps like bombs, moving saws and plants which shoots bombs. So drive fast and complete different tracks and avoid from walling out of track

Features::

- Steam achievement
- 25 tracks
- Turbo boosts
- Health system
- Traps like Plants with bombs, movinw saw, bombs
